game.name: Radiotext
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Radiotext is an interactive story set in the near future, where communication without intrusion requires radio-waves. Dive into a long-forgotten net in this text-based rpg, where you need to think carefully before typing your answers.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Radiotext is an interactive story set in the near future, where communication without intrusion requires radio-waves. Dive into a long-forgotten net in this text-based rpg, where you need to think carefully before typing your answers.
